snippet.title: KUNAI - Reveal Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PC)
snippet.description:
Wishlist KUNAI on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1001800/KUNAI/

The Arcade Crew and TurtleBlaze are happy to introduce you KUNAI, a Metroidvania adventure best explored through ninja-tier parkour and best survived with razor sharp combat reflexes, coming soon on PC and Nintendo Switch. 

To keep tabs on KUNAI, slash your way over to the official website (https://kunaigame.com) or ambush The Arcade Crew (https://twitter.com/TheArcadeCrew) or TurtleBlaze (https://twitter.com/turtleblaze) on Twitter. 


© The Arcade Crew - TurtleBlaze - 2019, all rights reserved.
